hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas (Allah be pleased with them) 'is reported to have said:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) put on Ihigm for Hajj. When four days of Dhu'l-Hijja were over, he led the dawn prayer, and when the prayer was complete, he said: He who wants to change it to Umra may do so

chapter.ara-name: باب جَوَازِ الْعُمْرَةِ فِي أَشْهُرِ الْحَجِّ
chapter.eng-name: It is permissible to perform 'Umrah during the months of Hajj
